description: List of all tables available in the database.

table_name.description: Exact table name as it appears in the database.

columns.description: List of all columns belonging to this table.

column_name.description: Column or field name in the table.

is_nullable.description: True if this column allows NULL values.

metadata.title: TableMetadata
metadata.description: Optional metadata about the table, may be null or partially filled.

description.description: Human-readable description of the table’s contents or purpose.

primary_key.description: Column name that serves as the table’s primary key, if applicable.

primary_key_description.description: Optional human-readable explanation of the primary key.

row_count_estimate.description: Approximate number of rows or records in the table.

key_columns.description: List of key columns used for identifying records or relationships.

foreign_keys.title: ForeignKeyRef
foreign_keys.description: List of foreign key references from this table to other tables.

foreign_key.description: Column in this table that serves as a foreign key.

primary_key_table.description: Name of the referenced table containing the primary key.

primary_key_column.description: Name of the referenced column in the primary key table.
